name: Canopy River Puerto Vallarta
description: For those of you who really take pleasure in nature the Sierra Madre Canopy Tour is definitely for you. Rio Cuale Canopy Tours, also known as Canopy River Canopy Tours, are definately for you. Canopy tours involve sliding from one high level forest platform to another along a steel cable suspended up to 200 meters above the Cuale River. The tour consists of 12 platforms and slides that wind down through an unspoiled forest valley and ancient rocky gorge.
